channel.title: [Release] Improved RSC Map Generator
channel.description:
This is a command line tool to generate every format of the landscape files (rscd, jag, and jag legacy).
[b]Improvements from imthenull's initial release[/b]: Support for all formats Support for all levels Bridges and docks are now rendered
[b]Loading[/b]: Drag landscape files into the appropriate directory for its type For RSCD, [[i]input/rscd/Landscape.rscd[/i]] For Jag (maps28 and over), [[i]input/jag/maps.jag[/i]; [i]input/jag/land.jag[/i]; [i]input/jag/maps.mem[/i]; [i]input/jag/land.mem[/i]] For Jag Legacy (maps27 and under), [[i]input/jag-legacy/maps.jag[/i]]
[b]Running[/b]: java -jar mapgen.jar [rscd/jag/jag-legacy]
[i]Note: I've preloaded some maps for each type in the zip file already[/i]
[b]It's pretty interesting to see how the development of the rsc world progressed[/b]: map14 (Creation of major cities and player owned houses) - [url=http://i.imgur.com/ajV79i1.png]http://i.imgur.com/ajV79i1.png[/url] map19 (Creation of karamja volcano) - [url=http://i.imgur.com/6VdrKVY.png]http://i.imgur.com/6VdrKVY.png[/url] map22 (Removal of player owned houses in varrock and falador) - [url=http://i.imgur.com/POWUYST.png]http://i.imgur.com/POWUYST.png[/url] map27 (Creation of the wilderness and crandor isle) - [url=http://i.imgur.com/AIIFIlG.png]http://i.imgur.com/AIIFIlG.png[/url]
Here's an ingame screenshot of map14 at varrock POH's - [url=http://i.imgur.com/9Gj0Icz.png]http://i.imgur.com/9Gj0Icz.png[/url]
Example (RSCD): [img]http://i.imgur.com/qPLZVpD.png[/img]
[b]Download[/b]: Map Generator - [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/s2lf2jo370xtihb/mapgen.zip?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/s2lf2jo370xtihb/mapgen.zip?dl=0[/url] Legacy Map Pack - [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/4q4ue36xp8qxoaf/legacy-maps.zip?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/4q4ue36xp8qxoaf/legacy-maps.zip?dl=0[/url]

item.title: [Release] Improved RSC Map Generator
item.dc:creator: @Zoso1 Zoso_
item.description:
@Zoso1 wrote:

This is a command line tool to generate every format of the landscape files (rscd, jag, and jag legacy).

Improvements from imthenull’s initial release:
Support for all formats
Support for all levels
Bridges and docks are now rendered

Loading:
Drag landscape files into the appropriate directory for its type
For RSCD, [input/rscd/Landscape.rscd]
For Jag (maps28 and over), [input/jag/maps.jag; input/jag/land.jag; input/jag/maps.mem; input/jag/land.mem]
For Jag Legacy (maps27 and under), [input/jag-legacy/maps.jag]

Running:
java -jar mapgen.jar [rscd/jag/jag-legacy]

Note: I’ve preloaded some maps for each type in the zip file already

It’s pretty interesting to see how the development of the rsc world progressed:
map14 (Creation of major cities and player owned houses) - http://i.imgur.com/ajV79i1.png
map19 (Creation of karamja volcano) - http://i.imgur.com/6VdrKVY.png
map22 (Removal of player owned houses in varrock and falador) - http://i.imgur.com/POWUYST.png
map27 (Creation of the wilderness and crandor isle) - http://i.imgur.com/AIIFIlG.png

Here’s an ingame screenshot of map14 at varrock POH’s - http://i.imgur.com/9Gj0Icz.png

Example (RSCD):

qPLZVpD.png2304×10944

Download:
Map Generator - https://www.dropbox.com/s/s2lf2jo370xtihb/mapgen.zip?dl=0
Legacy Map Pack - https://www.dropbox.com/s/4q4ue36xp8qxoaf/legacy-maps.zip?dl=0

Read full topic
